alert.note: Alert for Rock (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 26 at 12:06AM CST until December 26 at 3:00AM CST by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM CST EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Blowing snow and mixed precipitation. Additional snow accumulations less than a half inch, and possibly spotty ice accumulations of a light glaze. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph, most likely south of Interstate 90. * WHERE...Portions of northwest Iowa, southwest Minnesota and southeast South Dakota. * WHEN...Until 3 AM CST early this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could quickly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
